statements: SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_id, participant_city FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_city = 'New York' ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_city FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY participant_city ASC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_city IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM participants WHERE participant_age < 40;
SELECT DISTINCT participant_city FROM participants ORDER BY participant_city ASC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 18;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM Participants;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 25 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY participant_age LIMIT 5;

SELECT participant_name, performance_type, performance_score FROM Participants JOIN Performances ON Participants.participant_id = Performances.participant_id WHERE performance_score > 8 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;

SELECT Participants.participant_name, Performances.performance_type, Performances.performance_score FROM Performances JOIN Participants ON Participants.participant_id = Performances.participant_id WHERE Participants.participant_age < 30 ORDER BY Performances.performance_score ASC;

SELECT Participants.participant_name, Participants.participant_age, Performances.performance_type FROM Participants LEFT JOIN Performances ON Participants.participant_id = Performances.participant_id WHERE Performances.performance_score IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM participants LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participants WHERE participant_location='New York';
SELECT participant_name, participant_location, participant_age FROM participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT performance_song, performance_date FROM performances WHERE performance_duration > 120;
SELECT judge_name, judge_location FROM judges;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30
SELECT participant_name, participant_location FROM participants ORDER BY participant_location ASC
SELECT * FROM performances INNER JOIN participants ON performances.participant_id = participants.participant_id
SELECT participant_name, performance_date FROM participants LEFT JOIN performances ON participants.participant_id = performances.participant_id
SELECT judge_name, COUNT(*) AS total_performances FROM judges INNER JOIN performances ON judges.judge_id = performances.judge_id GROUP BY judge_name
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE performance_score > 8.0 ORDER BY performance_date ASC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_email FROM judges WHERE judge_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC, participant_age ASC;
SELECT performance_name, performance_score, performance_date FROM performances WHERE performance_score > 8.0 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_gender, judge_email FROM judges WHERE judge_gender = 'Female';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT performance_name, score FROM performances INNER JOIN scores ON performances.performance_id = scores.performance_id WHERE scores.score > 7.5 ORDER BY performance_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Singers;
SELECT singer_name, age, country FROM Singers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT singer_name, performance_title, performance_date FROM Singers, Performances WHERE Singers.singer_id = Performances.singer_id AND country = 'USA';
SELECT performance_title, judges_score FROM Performances WHERE judges_score > 8 ORDER BY judges_score DESC;
SELECT judge_name, specialization FROM Judges WHERE specialization IN ('Singing', 'Dancing');
SELECT * FROM Singers ORDER BY singer_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT singer_name, country FROM Singers WHERE age >= 30 AND country='USA';
SELECT performance_title, performance_date, judges_score FROM Performances WHERE judges_score > 8.0 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, specialization FROM Judges JOIN Assignments ON Judges.judge_id = Assignments.judge_id WHERE performance_id = 1001;
SELECT singer_name, award_name FROM Singers JOIN Awards ON Singers.singer_id = Awards.singer_id WHERE award_name LIKE '%Best%';
